questions_and_notes: Should include in a comment or the description: "surface upward flux of water vapor due to sublimation of surface ice".  Consider changing standard_name to "snow and ice" for consistency with other, similar variables.  Nearly redundant with sbl-Eday.  Also is sea ice included?  I don't think "where land" is needed.  If it is, then should be "where land over all_area_types"
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 2 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Sublimation of the Snow Free Area
comment: Rate of sublimation of ice into the atmosphere from areas with no snow.
